title: Dialogflow synchronization
content: Click the button to start the Dialogflow synchronization.

title: Refresh token
content: You will get this code by completing the Dialogflow synchronization.

title: Client ID or Agent Name
content: Enter the Project ID of your Dialogflow ES agent, or the Agent Name of your Dialogflow CX agent.

title: Location
content: Choose the location or region of your agent. This setting is optional if your agent location is global.

title: Edition
content: Choose the Dialogflow edition used by your agent.

title: Welcome Intent
content: Trigger the Dialogflow Welcome Intent for new visitors when the welcome message is active.

title: Multilingual
content: Activate the multilingual feature for the bot.

title: Language detection
content: Detect the language of the user' messages and change the user language and Dialogflow agent language accordingly, if available, otherwise, show a fallback message. You can use the following merge fields in the message: {language_name}.

title: Automatic translation
content: Automatically translates user messages into agent language and agent messages into user language.

title: Disable during office hours
content: Enable the bot outside of scheduled office hours only.

title: Human takeover request
content: If the bot doesn't understand a user's question/intent, automatically ask the user if he would like to contact an agent. If the user confirms the action the conversation is marked as unread, and the agents are notified. If you're using Slack, no messages will be sent if the bot knows the answer.

title: Notify agents of a fallback response
content: If the bot doesn't understand a user's question/intent, automatically notify agents and leave the conversation marked as unread. If you're using Slack, no messages will be sent if the bot knows the answer.

title: Disable bot if unknown answer
content: If the bot doesn't understand a user's question/intent, it's automatically disabled for 1 hour.

title: Offline message if unknown answer
content: Send the offline message only if the bot doesn't understand a user's question/intent.

title: Bot response delay
content: Add a delay (ms) to the bot's responses. Default is 2000.

title: Smart Reply
content: Follows a conversation between a human agent and an end user and provide response suggestions to the human agent in real-time.
